description: Ms. codex. Collective title from leaf 1a by a later hand. Origin: Text 1 dated 12 Ṣafar 1092 H [3 March 1681] (leaf 7b); text 2 dated 30 Ramaḍān 1096 H [30 August 1685] (leaf 55a); text 3 dated 1095 H [1683 or 1684] (leaf 96a). All texts copied by the same scribe, Muḥammad ʻAlī ibn Mullā ʻAlī Shāh (leaves 55a, 96a). Text 2 copied in Mashhad al-Riḍawīyah (leaf 55a); remaining texts likely copied in the same place.
abstract: Collection of texts on Shiʻite law.
contents: 1. leaves 3b-7b: al-Kitāb al-thālith min al-manhaj al-rābiʻ min al-Ḥabl al-matīn fī al-mawārīth / Bahāʾ al-Dīn al-ʻĀmilī.
2. leaves 8b-55a: Mukhtaṣar fī al-uṣūl / Muḥaqqiq al-Ḥillī.
extent: 96 leaves : paper ; 190 x 127 (89-143 x 50-73) mm bound to 190 x 129 mm
provenance: On leaf 1a, owner's note by Aḥmad Najīb ibn Aḥmad Ṭāhir. Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
dlme_provenance_en: On leaf 1a, owner's note by Aḥmad Najīb ibn Aḥmad Ṭāhir. Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
binding_note: Full brown leather with flap; blind-stamped central mandorla, pendants, and fillets; front doublure is marbled paper.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
